meanings.sent1: She overpaints the old chair to give it a fresh look.
meanings.sent2: He always overpaints his mistakes with a new layer of color.
meanings.sent3: The artist accidentally overpaints the canvas, creating a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm for painting overpaints any doubts about her skills.
meanings.sent5: The sun overpaints the sky with vibrant hues at sunset.

meanings.definition: Paint that has been applied over another layer of paint.
meanings.sent1: The overpaints on the wall were peeling off, revealing the original color.
meanings.sent2: She mixed different shades of overpaints to create a unique color for the project.
meanings.sent3: The overpaints in the art store caught her eye with their bright colors.
meanings.sent4: The overpaints on the antique dresser added a layer of history to the piece.
meanings.sent5: The overpaints on the canvas gave the artwork a textured appearance.
